name: Project-A
description:
A rogu-like game project demo.

Solo-developed by me.

Randomized dungeon generation, and 3 types of enemies in this demo.

Gamepad controls is available

- Controls -

WASD - Move&Aim (You can first attack 4 directions, and second attack 8 directions)

Left Click - Fİrst Attack

Right Click - Second Attack

LShift - Dash
